title: Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: ByteBuffer is not a valid flatbuffer model
body_html:
When I put the tflite file trained by the ssdmobilenet model into Android studio, the following error occurred. Who can help me? Below is my configuration information and wrong information.

E/AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: main
Process: org.tensorflow.lite.demo, PID: 20339
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: ByteBuffer is not a valid flatbuffer model

Who can help me? Thanks!
